sub_title: Business, scientific & academic writing trainer/Experienced all round English language & exams teacher
summary: I am a versatile English language teacher delivering general, exam-based and specialist courses at all levels. I prepare students for Cambridge, IELTS or Toefl exams; offer training in scientific and business writing; and teach academic English within the university context. I am also keen on developing clientâ€™s presentation and speaking skills within their professional environments. My work involves developing completely new courses for class-based or online contexts and I can offer specialist courses on request (for example, Pyramid Writing). I work with and at several universities but feel just as much at home in the business setting. I am an organised, well-prepared teacher who has a friendly, and confidence-inducing approach. I believe in making the learning experience practical, interactive, well-focused and flexible. I look to improve confidence, fluency and accuracy in the way clients use English.
